languages.text: {n}Урбенд белеет от ужаса. По некрасивой гримасе на породистом лице ясно, что это — не притворство, он и впрямь в ужасе.{/n} "Губ... Губительных сил? Поистине ужасная весть. Прославляю вашу решимость и непоколебимую строгость! Смерть врагам Человечества!"

{n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"
languages.original_text: {n}Урбенд белеет от ужаса. По некрасивой гримасе на породистом лице ясно, что это — не притворство, он и впрямь в ужасе.{/n} "Губ... Губительных сил? Поистине ужасная весть. Прославляю вашу решимость и непоколебимую строгость! Смерть врагам Человечества!"

{n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

languages.text: {n}Drivestem pâlit de terreur. À la grimace trahissant son habituelle contenance d'aristocrate, il est clair que sa peur n'est pas feinte.{/n} « Les P... Puissances de la Ruine ? Mais c'est horrible ! Je salue votre détermination et votre sévérité sans faille ! Mort aux ennemis de l'humanité ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem pâlit de terreur. À la grimace trahissant son habituelle contenance d'aristocrate, il est clair que sa peur n'est pas feinte.{/n} « Les P... Puissances de la Ruine ? Mais c'est horrible ! Je salue votre détermination et votre sévérité sans faille ! Mort aux ennemis de l'humanité ! »

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔脸色吓得苍白。他难看的脸色与他的贵族举止完全不符，看得出来，他真的吓坏了。{/n}“毁……毁灭之力？这真是个可怕的消息。赞美您的决心与坚定不移的原则！人类之敌只有死路一条！”
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔脸色吓得苍白。他难看的脸色与他的贵族举止完全不符，看得出来，他真的吓坏了。{/n}“毁……毁灭之力？这真是个可怕的消息。赞美您的决心与坚定不移的原则！人类之敌只有死路一条！”

languages.text: {n}Drivestem erbleicht vor Entsetzen. Die unziemliche Grimasse auf seinem aristokratischen Antlitz zeigt deutlich, dass er seine Furcht nicht vortäuscht.{/n} "M-Mächte der Zerstörung? Das sind ja schreckliche Neuigkeiten. Gepriesen sei Eure Entschlossenheit und unnachgiebige Strenge! Tod den Feinden der Menschheit!"
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem erbleicht vor Entsetzen. Die unziemliche Grimasse auf seinem aristokratischen Antlitz zeigt deutlich, dass er seine Furcht nicht vortäuscht.{/n} "M-Mächte der Zerstörung? Das sind ja schreckliche Neuigkeiten. Gepriesen sei Eure Entschlossenheit und unnachgiebige Strenge! Tod den Feinden der Menschheit!"

languages.text: {n}Drivestem palidece, aterrorizado. Es evidente por la mueca poco elegante de su rostro aristocrático que no está fingiendo miedo.{/n} «¿P-poderes Ruinosos? Qué horror. ¡Elogio su determinación y severidad inquebrantable! ¡Muerte a los enemigos de la Humanidad!».
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem palidece aterrorizado. Es evidente por la mueca poco elegante de su rostro aristocrático que no está fingiendo miedo.{/n} «¿P-poderes Ruinosos? Qué horror. ¡Elogio su determinación y severidad inquebrantable! ¡Muerte a los enemigos de la Humanidad!».

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムは恐怖で青ざめる。上流階級の顔立ちに似つかわしくない険しい表情を見れば、その恐怖が見せかけでないことは明らかだ。{/n}「ま、禍つ神々？何て恐ろしい話でしょう。その決意と揺るぎない厳正さは素晴らしい！人類の敵に死を！」
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムは恐怖で青ざめる。上流階級の顔立ちに似つかわしくない険しい表情を見れば、その恐怖が見せかけでないことは明らかだ。{/n}「ま、禍つ神々？何て恐ろしい話でしょう。その決意と揺るぎない厳正さは素晴らしい！人類の敵に死を！」

languages.text: {n}Dehşete düşen Drivestem'in beti benzi soluyor. Aristokrat çehresinde beliren nahoş buruşukluklar, bu korkunun sahte olmadığının net bir göstergesi.{/n} "Y... Yıkıcı Güçler mi? Gerçekten de korkunç. Kararlılığınıza ve sarsılmaz katılığınıza büyük saygı duyuyorum! İnsanlığın düşmanlarına ölüm!"
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pales in terror. It is clear from the unseemly grimace on his aristocratic countenance that his fear is not feigned.{/n} "R-Ruinous Powers? Truly horrifying news. I commend your resolve and unwavering severity! Death to the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem dehşete düşüyor ve beti benzi soluyor. Aristokrat çehresinde beliren nahoş buruşukluklar bu korkunun sahte olmadığının net bir göstergesi.{/n} "Yıkıcı Güçler mi? Haberler gerçekten de korkunç. Kararlılığınız ve sarsılmaz katılığınıza büyük saygı duyuyorum! İnsanlığın düşmanlarına ölüm!"
